definition[0]: all the people who read a particular newspaper or magazine regularly
example[0]: They are hoping that the paper will have quite a wide readership.
example[1]: a magazine with a readership of 60,000
definition[1]: the job that a Reader has in a British university
definition[2]: the people who read a particular newspaper or magazine
example[3]: The magazine has a largely male readership.
example[4]: Readership of the ‘Birmingham Evening Mail’ fell about 10.6% last year.
